props.name: pastScrollRange
props.description: Max amount of months allowed to scroll to the past

props.name: futureScrollRange
props.description: Max amount of months allowed to scroll to the future

props.name: calendarStyle
props.description: Specify style for calendar container element

props.name: calendarWidth
props.description: Used when calendar scroll is horizontal, (when pagingEnabled = false)

props.name: staticHeader
props.description: Whether to use a fixed header that doesn't scroll (when horizontal = true)

props.name: showScrollIndicator
props.description: Whether to enable or disable vertical / horizontal scroll indicator
